topics.body:
at the end i decided i dont want to be a lawyer.

they live under far too much stress if they work on big cities (my mom has time and is healthy cause she works in a small town), i have seen 20 something lawyers with their hairline so far back their head it looked like germany on 1945.

instead ill be a law teacher, we have one who isnt a lawyer at all, instead he dedicates to simply teach and debate.

fucker can dress whoever he feels like, travels the world, and has like 20 tattoos.
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

But it's up to you to decide. Whatever it is, good luck.

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5441fee96368725e59190100#post_5441fee96368725e59190100

oh who gives a fuck only petty criminals have grudges lawyers.

organized criminals know killing a lawyer wont do shit, only bring another one and keep the process going.

lawyers dont got control over the case so they dont got much to change if they are threatened or bribed.

now the judge, thats another story.

also lawyers and judges can choose which cases to take and which not.

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54420c49636872063a500100#post_54420c49636872063a500100
*facepalm* DAMN IT, ZATCH/GASH!! YOU DO NOT SAY SHIT LIKE THAT WHEN A GIRL HAS A CRUSH ON YOU!!!! *ROFL*

Welp, I got a default roster for Shonen Jump vs. Capcom: Heroes United, my game idea, guys. Here it is!

Ryu - Street Fighter
Chun-Li - Street Fighter II
Haggar - Final Fight
Felicia - Darkstalkers: The Night Warriors
Mega Man - Mega Man
Batsu - Rival Schools: United By Fate
Ibuki - Street Fighter III: New Generation
Ruby Heart - Dai Koukai Frontier
Kaijin no Soki - Onimusha: Dawn of Dreams
Jedah - Darkstalkers 
Wesker - Resident Evil
Viewtiful Joe - Viewtiful Joe
Phoenix Wright - Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney
Tron Bonne - Mega Man Legends
Seth - Street Fighter IV

Goku - Dragon Ball
Lenalee - D.Gray-man
Kinnikuman - Kinnikuman
Lala - To Love-Ru
Arale - Dr. Slump
Yusuke - Yu Yu Hakusho
Naruto - Naruto
Luffy - One Piece
Ichigo - Bleach
Dio - JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
Light - Death Note
Wingman - Yume Senshi Wingman
Kankichi Ryotsu - Kochikame
Hitomi - Cat's Eye
Cell - Dragon Ball Z

Mixed up what eras from Jump's 45 years of publication
